extendedInfo.description: Battle it out with anyone, anytime, anywhere in one of the first and only multi-player games on Android!Win to gain experience, unlock new features, customize your avatar, and socialize with friends.Will you be the last one standing?Keywords: marble, physics, multiplayer, multi player, scores, customizations, achievements, friends, social, chat, seasonal, customize, avatar, game, addicting, addictive, online, internetWe have put a lot of time and thought into this application and hope you will enjoy using it.  We want to keep Cestos completely free. Google AdSense (our previous ad provider) has recently been shut down... In order to keep the app 100% free, and still keep our servers running, we've opted to include a new type of ad network as a trial.

reviews.title: Impressive game
reviews.comment: Probably the most addictive one-on-one game out there, and it gets better the more that you play it! Takes a little while to get good, so be patient. Hours & hours of fun!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I remember playing this on my MyTouch 3G way back, still a great game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looking forward to see more games like this
reviews.comment: Awesome game to play with friends, but i would really like to see something more than just the color of my ball while playing. At least the texture. Anyways, great game. Wish there were more active players. Playing with bots at least.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More players
reviews.comment: fun game love it but Cant play if no ones ever on.... needs more people and a way to invite people outside of the game to play
reviews.author: kelsy kirby

reviews.title: D
reviews.comment: Have to start all over with new phone. Lag heavy, FC a lot, and doesn\'t respond to touch often. Galaxy S  II
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: D:
reviews.comment: When I had Cestos on my old phone, it was incredibly popular. Now, it\'s just sad..there aren\'t nearly enough people to play with nor talk to :c the lobby is always empty and you wait forever to play one game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Addicting game u can play w friends. Small size.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: CHAT FIX IDEA
reviews.comment: Try installing an updated version of gingerbread keyboard for Android.   Enter chat field in game long press and choose the correct keyboard option.  Hope this helps :)  Good Luck SICARIUS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cus words
reviews.comment: I don\'t really like how some people say bad words. But its still fun. My favorite part is the costomeising yourself
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pathetic
reviews.comment: Have to have people playing. Nobody ever is so it\'s impossible to play a round. Should make a an option for computerized player so you can at least have the option to play
reviews.author: Erik Wallgren

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Very good online game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: EVO 4G
reviews.comment: This is a great game buy my keyboard will not show up. And will not let me in lobbies. FIX!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stopped connecting
reviews.comment: Was working fine earlier, now it won\'t connect. Also, cant chat because the keyboard doesn\'t show up. Fix this!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game, works well
reviews.comment: This is a pretty unique game. Fun, some strategy, and good onlone play. Easy to use online system that is simple and works well.
reviews.author: Daniel A

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: It\'s fun and does not lag. The one problem I had was that during a game the chat would not work. I would type but nothing showed up. Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wow, was cool for my hero, now I\'m on sensation,  sucks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it... But
reviews.comment: I got a new phone and it isnt letting me download wtf!||-SC4RY-||
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very fun
reviews.comment: But the keyboard doesn\'t work. HTC EVO 4G.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force closes.
reviews.comment: Really love the game, but all these bugs forcing it to close are really a killer. 90% of my losses were caused by force closing. Please fix!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wont load
reviews.comment: It wont even start up.. it just says connecting for like 10 minutes... had on apple product worked great but not on my tab 2..
